item.description:
ATTENTION, BEGINNERS!!

We will have our first Beginners ASL meetup of the fall next week! Typically this meetup has been a chance for beginners--and I mean beginners!--to practice what they have learned thus far, whether it is fingerspelling, vocab, or juts learning the alphabet. We might have a fingerspelling game for the advanced beginners if there is a large enough group.

So if you are just starting out, or if you started a while back but are way out of practice, you are welcome at this meetup!

And a NOTE for advanced signers: you are welcome to come too, but please be willing to help out with the beginners, as opposed to forming a separate group of yourselves. There are plenty of meetups for you guys. This one is for the NEWBIES!!

We'll be meeting at Diesel, mainly because of the A/C issues Starbucks has been having. See you next week!

Russ
item.name: BEGINNER LEVEL ASL Meetup
